title: Plus-sized model crowned beauty pageant in Brazil
body: Brazil: A special beauty pageant took place in Brazil that attracted 29 women, weighing around 100 kilograms, to participate. In the end, a 19-year-old girl won the contest, reports the CGTN. According to the organizers, the competition aimed at helping women being comfortable in their skin. To stay on top of the ever-changing world of business, subscribe now to our newsletters.
